name: BookGenie
tag_list: digital-asset-management, epub-conversion, e-publishing, digital-typesetting, data-conversion, content-management-solutions, e-book-conversion, ocr-capture, digital-imaging-and-rework, journal-publishing, digital-document-solutions, content-production-opt
overview:
Total digital solution provider for publishing

BookGenie is one of the renowned solution providers in content management and content transformation that has extensively worked with K-12 book publishers, STM Publishers and Trade Publishers. Publishers and online libraries get the best support for the services like e publishing, digital typesetting, data conversion, content management solutions, DTD development, scanning and imaging. BookGenie provides best support in forms processing, OCR capture, digital imaging, data mining, ebook conversion, epub conversion, online book publishing and journal publishing.
